section.p: This chapter provides information and procedures to prepare your deployment for an upgrade. To facilitate a trouble-free upgrade, please read through this chapter carefully and perform all of the procedures in it.
section.note: Download a copy of the for the new release and review it before proceeding to the next section. A new release could include a new requirement, such as a specific kernel version, and that information is not included in this publication.
section.p: The following list outlines the preparations:

ol.li: Download and stage files for offline upgrades, if necessary.
Get set up to run a CLI session on each CC cluster host at the same time.
Start CLI sessions on all CC cluster hosts.

Verify that the CC config files on each type of CC host are identical, except known diffs on ZK nodes:
master
worker-rm-zk
worker-rm
worker-collector
Perform tasks for new requirements, if any.
